summary: Capture and store a soul and release them later at your discretion, WARNING May cause you to murder Nazeem in 50 different ways
descriptionHtml:
[center]Adds 2 spells in the arch mage quarters, one to capture a soul, the other to release it.
Video once again says it all mkay
[youtube]eFEt2h83a8s[/youtube]
I got tired of making fancy ones for simple spells rofl

As usual the trailer for the alpha of discworld of which all these spells will be part of
[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube]
[/center]

Description
Adds two spells in the arch mage quarters in winterhold
One to capture a soul
One to release it
Only one soul can be captured at any point
Anything can be captured (Bosses included)
Sometimes they dont disapear and run around all tiny, probably just a script bugging out when running
Will not trigger any hostilities (Unless they are hostile already)
author: darren83
